p: The strain of the cowpea weevil, C. maculatus, was maintained on black-eyed peas, Vigna unguiculata under laboratory conditions of 30 ± 1 °C and 50 ± 5% RH under 16L: 8D photoperiod. All experiments were accomplished under the same conditions. The newly emerged (< 24 h-old) adults and eggs (< 24 h-old) were chosen to set up the experiments.
